website_summaries.verdict: Created with witch hazel and tea tree oil, these pore strips work wonderfully to remove 2-times more blackheads, giving you the deepest clean you can see and feel.
pros: Suitable for all skin types to use 1 to 2 times per week
cons: Some have said their skin felt dried out after use

customer_reviews.title: A plus!
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin like no other...my t zone is a hot mess. I would of thought in my 40s this issue would have stopped.This stuff saved my face..I can feel it tingling!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!. I saw other reviews claiming it did not work well. For it to be effective, make sure to do it after a hot shower when your pores are open and apply immediately. It is not enough to just have your skin wet.
customer_reviews.author: SarahNu

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist recommend I try adding in salicylic acid into my daily routine and I'm so happy I did! This doesn't irritate my skin at all. I apply it after I wash my face, but before I use my benzoyl peroxide. It really helps keep my annoying hormonal breakouts at bay. One down side of salicylic acid is that if you stop using it, all your breakouts come back. I stopped using it for 2 days while camping and I started breaking out much faster than I thought I would after only 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Rowan O.

customer_reviews.title: Supper good stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this is some pretty amazing stuff!! I've never really had acne just bad breakouts right before my period and while pregnant or breestfeeding.. Then i turned 30 and started having massive hormonal acne breakouts all over my jaw line!! This with the pink grafruit line literally cleared me up in less then three weeks!!! The deep cystic acne is basically gone!!!! Completely flat and still needs a little love but i am only half way through my first bottle.. This and the pink grapefruit line guys, I'm telling ya!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I know this is a gross photo to post and TMI for most but if you are truly looking for a good review you have to get real....my daughter and I both just used these and thought that they got way less than what we are accustomed to when using the Biore strips we get at grocery store....these claimed to be ultra deep but barely pulled anything up...thus a waste of time and money...
customer_reviews.author: Life Learner

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do much for my acne
customer_reviews.text: I normally use Clinique Clarifying Lotion (#2) and it's expensive! Seeing that Biore made a toner with almost every top ingredient being the same, I bought this and assumed it would work as well. Wrong. Used it twice a day every day and got through a whole bottle but my skin just kept looking worse. Went back to using the expensive stuff and my skin cleared up again like it was before. Unfortunate because this is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Church

customer_reviews.title: Great for very dry/comb skin and sensitive.
customer_reviews.text: It’s been helping control acne, leaves your skin feel very clean and soft. I’ve been using this for about a month or two and my skin has looked more radiant and smooth. Also, has helped lighten my acne scars a bit. My skin is very dry but oily on my t zone and sensitive. So I was scared this would make it worse but it didn’t leave my skin dry or feeling dry. Great product and great price! Tip: have a great moisturizer and do sheet mask every once week if you feel it’s being a little dry on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mooniee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I found this toner to be too harsh. The alcohol burned my blemishes and irritated my skin, leaving it dry and flakey. On a positive note, my pores were less noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is a must have. Will never go without it again.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of harsh smell and stings a little on my face and also makes it oily BUT it has made my face look better. EDITED TO ADD: I ran out of this first bottle 3 days ago and my face already has already 10 spots of acne on it after not having a single one since I used this every morning. Will definitely be buying again and I recommend it for anyone that has persistent acne, blackheads or bumps on their face all the time
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, try it
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite toner! Whips them pores into shape lol
customer_reviews.author: AE

customer_reviews.title: Give it a shot! I’m glad I did!
customer_reviews.text: I had acne that wouldn’t go away with any product :adapelene, benzoyl peroxide, retinol cream or other salicylic acid face scrubs. THIS WORKED! I just put a small amount on a cotton ball and clean my whole face before bed and in the morning and my skin is clear !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works !
customer_reviews.text: This really works ! I have been using it everyday then my mom said what happens to your face I looked in the mirror and in the middle of the day I noticed the area that has the most back heads , the prices were open. And the black heads were out. It's literally cleaning my face through out the day. Amazing results, and the dark marks on my neck are fading.
customer_reviews.author: cissy

customer_reviews.title: They actually work!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually write reviews but these aren’t the same strips I used as a teenager!! My husband was getting several large blackheads on his nose and I ordered these and lord it was so damn satisfying when I removed it from his nose. Never thought I’d get that excited over a blackhead nose strip but here we are lol Pictures don’t lie on this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Harsh for Dry Skin :(
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product - I have dry skin and was looking for something to help clear up blackheads. This sounded perfect, but after two uses it left my face covered in dry, red patches. Maybe using it less frequently would prevent this from happening, but I don’t think I’m going to use it again - I’ll take blackheads over red patchy skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these ultra strong strips.
customer_reviews.text: Love these ultra strong strips. I could find them in my local Walmart at one time, but haven’t seen them in a year. Chanced amazon and found these. For be they are worth the money you can see the blackheads And even some tiny, tiny hairs once you take it off your nose. The regular strips don’t do anything for me.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M.

customer_reviews.title: Not noticeably different from regular
customer_reviews.text: Took off one star because I can’t tell a difference between the Deep Cleansing and the regular ones and regular ones are cheaper. But, much like the regular ones still very effective
customer_reviews.author: Emily M.

customer_reviews.title: Lighter and cleaner skin
customer_reviews.text: This is an honest review. This stuff is amazing! I was skeptical at first when I started using it but I kept on using it and boy am I glad I did. I've had bad skin all my life, acne and acne scars, very very oily skin. I would never go a day without makeup. I started using this product and my face did a total 360. I can now go places without makeup and not be ashamed. My face feels cleaner, my acne scars has lightened up, and my pigmentation is getting better. Give this product a chance because it will change your life, it did mines.
customer_reviews.author: vera vidato

customer_reviews.title: Gets out so much gunk! Did one on me ...
customer_reviews.text: Gets out so much gunk! Did one on me and my boyfriend (I have cleaner pores than him due to constantly cleaning my face, etc) and his got out sooo much stuff! Mine was normal, but both of us were so impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan N. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: It cleans your face and anything else you was with it
customer_reviews.text: I thought I ordered a repeat of the 'Bioré Blemish Fighting Ice Cleanser', but I got this stuff instead. It's ok, and better than most everything else, but it's just not as good... 😏
customer_reviews.author: Terrapinbrad

customer_reviews.title: In loveeeeeee
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying to find a pore strip that works and I definitely found the one !! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany. C

customer_reviews.title: Harsh on my skin
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin and have used many of biores witch hazel products religiously. However with this one, I feel like I can only use it to wash my face like 2 times a week or my face dries out so badly and gets patchy. I wish it wasn't so harsh because I love the product line.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Manz

customer_reviews.title: My husband started to take them because he liked them so much though and now I have to ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried this product a couple times now and every time I use them I barely get any discharge left on the paper and my nose ends up breaking out the next day. The last time I tried this product, I had 6 pimples on my nose the next day. I don't know what the issue is, but maybe it's just my skin. My husband started to take them because he liked them so much though and now I have to order them for him..
customer_reviews.author: great cook

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, affordable option!
customer_reviews.text: I previously used murad and Rodan and fields face wash for acne but it got too expensive. I’ve tried a few other acne washes and found that the one is the best! I have oily skin and after using the face for two weeks with this wash my skin has cleared up AND it feels great! Love the smell too!
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: These just work!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with how much gunk came out with this strip. I used one for the first time last night, and once more this morning just out of curiosity. The second strip didn't have nearly as much, but still a decent amount. For context, I have huge pores on my nose and extremely oily skin. I wash my face twice a day with a salicylic acid cleanser and use moisturizer. The skin on my nose immediately felt smooth and pliable, whereas before I was used to it feeling...rubbery? Thick? I honestly didn't know my skin could feel like this. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Noonoh

customer_reviews.title: Ohh yeah!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using a Certain & Clearly blue brand since childhood and always lived the fresh and clean feeling after using, but hated the stench it caused the bathroom trash can. Tried this with reservations just for fun & Amazon price/ availability, and I'm hooked. Tried yet another brand afterwards b/c I like their micellar water & alcohol- free sounded good. Should have known better... apparently my facial toner (much like my beverages) REQUIRES alcohol to do its intended job. Wish I could bathe in the stuff.
customer_reviews.author: SKOL

customer_reviews.title: Deep Cleaning🤔🕵🏻‍♀️, 📽 & Pics 😲 & Ensure 👇🥇📭 Pores with Warm/🔥 ➡️ 💦
customer_reviews.text: Title of review, 📽 + 2 pics says it all, ➕💝 ... Let's remember🕯💡 to often pamper💆🏻‍♀️🧖🏻‍♀️🛀🏽😍🤩🥰🤗 all neutral aspects of full-potential, Multidimensional, whole self (physical self)/Self (Soul🌝 & Spirit🌚 within🌗⚖☯️✡⚕), part of MOST IMPORTANT unconditional self-💖---which allows our inner, full cup to naturally, effortlessly, and generously overflow🏞 to interconnected 🕸🌸🌎🌌🌠♾✳✴💗.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what it is, but I definitely feel the difference between a knock off brand and real Biore strips. in my experience, Biore strips stick better and leave my nose feeling smoother. I place warm water in my hand and soak my nose in it to open up my pores a little more just before placing the strip.
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: The Product works!! However!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product, I took it out of the package and it was already out. Meaning most of it split out! I noticed that it had did not have a seal on the bottle (seal was broken), and wasn't taped. When I smelled the Bore Witch Hazel, it did not smell as usual and the color was a liter yellow, It had been water down. I will not be ordering from this company again!!! I need a refund or replace it the the original Bore Witch Hazel...
customer_reviews.author: MRS. IYANDA

customer_reviews.title: Best Toner
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin so I am hesitant about using products. However, my skin absolutely loves this product. It was recommended by an esthetician, and I must admit; it is the best toner I've used. I use it nightly after washing my face. It leaves my face feeling refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Deme

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this face wash! I use it every night to wash my face. I like the cleansing feeling that it gives when I have it sitting on my face. I also use and soft silicone face scrubber and it works great with it. Haven’t had a break out and black heads are to a minimum. Face is also so smooth now!
customer_reviews.author: katherine

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I'll use them much, but can recommend them for guys and woman. LOL
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend uses these to help remove her makeup and clean her pores. She loves them and I even tried one on my nose, WOW, as a dude didn't think clogged pores was something I had to think about, but these strips will show you otherwise. So one more item to have on your guy maintenance list. Or do like I do just use some of your partners, she 2ill either not care and ir laughter at you. But if you are a real man and self confident, you can handle it. Not sure I'll use them much, but can recommend them for guys and woman. LOL
customer_reviews.author: The Reaper DRR  TM

customer_reviews.title: Great value, works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Great smell, I wasn't expecting the fragrance but was pleasantly surprised. After having given birth to our twins, I have started getting hormonal acne for the first time in my life and didn't know what to do. I really don't want to be on hormonal birth control so I was trying a few different products until I found this one. It really cleared up cystic acne on my jawline and made my blackheads disappear! Within a week of use, my face was almost back to its former glory and I'm very happy with it. I do make sure to use a decent moisturizer after cleaning my face since this can be drying.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Schoellner

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It works very very well! It doesn’t get every single pore out. (Which I didn’t expect) but it really made a huge difference. Super happy with this. I will definitely keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff very refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Iove this stuff I use it every night it leaves my skin feeling good and fresh and it has helped with my hormonal acne.
customer_reviews.author: Karren rose

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It works!
customer_reviews.text: To be used as a toner, apply to clean face! It leaves a thin coat (dries without feeling sticky, tacky). Ingredients include one of the famous anti-acne medication (too lazy to get up from porch to go check name). It works great for me, no more annoying breakouts, my pores look smaller and cleaner. May be drying for sensitive/dry skin, mine is combination and most oily in summer.
customer_reviews.author: M Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Men... it’s okay to use this product!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a guy that uses this, and frankly it’s made my skin 10x better. I never had bad acne, but the occasional breakout that lasts for a while. This has both treated smaller breakouts, helped clear discoloration from past spots, and helps prevent new ones. Taking a cotton pad once a day before bed or in the morning is absolutely worth it. Guys - use this product if you’ve got breakouts or oily skin! The 10 seconds it takes to do is worth it, especially given the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: SKIN DESTROYER
customer_reviews.text: NOOOOOOOO. PEOPLE, DO NOT PUT THINGS THAT HAVE ALCOHOL ON YOUR FACE. It will age your skin faster and make your acne scars and wrinkles look worse. This will dry out your skin, destroy your natural skin barriers and fracture the surface for long term damage. I have had severe acne for years and this absolutely made it worse. I read the ingredient bottle and dumped it down the drain. Shame on me for not looking at ingredients before I buy a product but shame on them for marketing a cooling agent as a facial toner. No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Matty_bop

customer_reviews.title: Follow the instructions! Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be adding these to my skin care routine. I see people saying these don’t work and there’s no way. Make sure your pores are open from steam or hot water. Then soak your nose with more water everywhere. Then leave on. For best results I’d say the longer you leave it on the harder it’ll get. Feel like people aren’t leaving it on long enough so it isn’t hardening enough. 20 mins is good!
customer_reviews.author: Shelbee Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Nice daily cleanser, even if you don’t have acne
customer_reviews.text: I love Biore face soaps in general and this one is no exception. I do not have acne and didn’t realize this was an acne soap when I purchased. However, I do not find it to be drying or harsh on my dry skin. Nice scent, rinsed off well, and leaves my skin feeling clean and refreshed. Follow up with your daily moisturizer and sunscreen!
customer_reviews.author: cke

customer_reviews.title: I have combination skin and this works great
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the great reviews I decided to try this on my big pores, I notice my skin gets softer and feel smoother in a week, I used to exfoliate every week to clean my pores, but now my skin is a lot smoother I don’t need to exfoliate as often, and I notice this product also eliminates oiliness, I would definitely buy again and again
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: This batch was disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought six boxes when I noticed a good price on offer. I've been sadly disappointed with this batch. The adhesive simply does not work well. I've purchased and used many boxes of Biore Ultra strips from other vendors/stores and had previously been very pleased with the results. I suspect that these boxes were either old or had been subjected to temperature abuse or other damage in warehousing or transport.
customer_reviews.author: CFoster

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable Improvement in My Skin After Using
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised to actually see my skin respond so well to the Bioré Witch Hazel Pore Clarifying Cleanser. Having tried so many different cleansers - for my oily/acne-prone skin, this one tops my list as the most effective. This will definitely be my go-too facial cleanser from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Nannie_Boo_USA

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It was delivered yesterday and I washed my face twice and used this following the face wash. I woke up this morning and all the smaller bumps and red spots are gone. I was able to go make up free this morning! I also used this on my husband (he has bad acne) and his spots are already looking much better! This is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Rodocker

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged
customer_reviews.text: This a great price for the product. It was well packaged and there were no leaks. This is like many other salcylic acid toners out there, but I think it has a more pleasent smell than other options. It can definitely be drying, so I would take that into consideration when deciding when and how often to use it. I even use this on my chest to help with cheat acne.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Davis

customer_reviews.title: My skin loveeeeee this
customer_reviews.text: This smells amazing and my skin had transformed since using this toner. This helps to clean and moisturize my skin at the same time. After using this i no longer have dry patches the next day after washing my face. I also noticed my skin looks more supple and overall moisturized and vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Tacheline

customer_reviews.title: my favorite
customer_reviews.text: nice and moist, very slight fragrance, face feels clean without any residue or oily film left on it. Health issues have slowed me down and changed many aspects of daily life. The convenience of these and how nicely they clean my face is a real help. I prefer these to the others I have tried and will be repeat buyer.
customer_reviews.author: abcwva

customer_reviews.title: Not good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and when I put this one it immediately started burning and I had to quickly wash it off. It must be the alcohol in it, because I have used other toners with witch hazel and never had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G

customer_reviews.title: It workssss
customer_reviews.text: I got this product not knowing any history and just going based off of all the reviews and I just want to say that it’s amazing every time I put it on my face it feels extremely refreshed and it feels like it’s making a BIG difference!
customer_reviews.author: AllyCamacho93

customer_reviews.title: Keeps breakouts under control
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was tired of breaking out. It does its job really well. I like that it's a nice, non-watery consistency... meaning it lasts a long time. I'm a man and don't really care for its scent; it doesn't linger and goes away as soon as you wash it off. It's important that you apply a light moisturizer after using this since it has acne medication that can dry out your skin. I use another acne moisturizer for that.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Really Works On Those Stubborn Blackheads!
customer_reviews.text: Only product that has worked on my husband's stubborn blackheads. I've seen him scrub and exfoliate until his nose was almost raw, but those blackheads wouldn't budge. Used this strip as directed and it pulled them right out. Ew! It was pretty disgusting. His nose looks so clean now!
customer_reviews.author: DRM-TX

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love anything witch hazel . I have very sensitive skin and eczema so you can imagine it’s really hard to find a thing that works for me. I’ve decided the last month or so to only use Luke warm water and this! It’s been amazing! My face looks and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: AutumnNY

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible. Too much water and they don't work at all. Perfect amount and they still bearly work. Not enough adhesive and I don't like them at all. Might as well just push the stupid things out myself. You still have to after using this anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Shy

customer_reviews.title: Will order again in the future 😊
customer_reviews.text: Loved the way my face felt & looked after using this face wash. I was using another product that seemed to be irritating my sensitive skin & acne, so I decided to try this & it was wonderful. My face actually felt & looked very clean after using & the redness went away & it did not irritate my skin at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Harsh on the skin
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with this purchase. I really didn’t like this product. I feel like these just pull at my skin rather than really pulling anything out of my pores. It definitely hurts when you’re peeling it off. And that shouldn’t be the case when using any skincare products! I would recommend using the three step peels instead, those typically hurt a lot less and are a lot more effective with removing blackheads and clearing out your pores.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia L

customer_reviews.title: Works Good
customer_reviews.text: It works like any other pore strip. I advise putting it on after a shower when you're pores are open.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Read the ingredients first
customer_reviews.text: Contains alcohol, fragrances, and menthol - not ingredients I would normally choose for skin care. I'll take more time reading the label before I purchase another face wash I'm not familiar with.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Highly Efficient!
customer_reviews.text: I like using this since it help clear my pores and after one month, I had stopping getting acne around my cheek area! It's way better than the Korean acne toner I bought before. Plus, the good things is that I use this twice per day and it help close out the clogged pores and cleared the acne scar. If you have an acne cream, use it at night and it will clear the face even better.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Soo nice and mosturizing
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of this it is so pure and natural and feels so moisturizing on my face the price was so amazing and if u have sensitive I recommend cuz honey omg it is so gentle and I put a spray cap on it in the morning I just spritz and leave it takes 2 seconds and I get this natural glow where ever i go! That rhymed lol.
customer_reviews.author: mommyof2

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for couple years now. I've noticed it's best after shower as the pores are open. I recently used this on my teenage son who has acne and HAD blackheads on his nose. We were so surprised that one strip cleared his blackheads. He has his own box of this product to use regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Niti

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend:)
customer_reviews.text: I love this face wash! It has a nice tingle to it similar to when I use peppermint sugar scrub. I have some issues with eczema and have no issues using this once a day to every other day. I've definitely noticed a difference with my pores.
customer_reviews.author: Sariah

customer_reviews.title: Great nose strips!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just don’t look at the strip when you finish. It’s pretty crazy to see the dirt in your pores come out like this. But it feels a lot safer than a facial for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Polstein

customer_reviews.title: My New Bff:)
customer_reviews.text: Super fresh face no sticky feel or tingling. I always use Cerave but this feels so moist and refreshing. Ordered a second bottle just incase they discontinue. This back in the day product is definitely new life for my sensitive skin. Major plus it decreases oil and shine on my face which is extremely helpful without over drying.
customer_reviews.author: Asia W.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big skin care connoisseur, so I’ve had experience with several toners in the past. This one really got the job done. It worked better than my $30 green tea one I got at Sephora. It is harsher than the others I’ve used, which I think I needed. However, if you’re sensitive, I don’t believe this is the product for you. The scent is harsh, and you can feel the product working. As in, you can feel the astringency. I liked it. It hasn’t irritated my skin, it’s kept my breakouts at bay, and I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe V

customer_reviews.title: Not for oily faces
customer_reviews.text: These strips did not work for me. I washed my face as instructed and left my nose wet as well. Still not not remove anything from my nose after it dried. My face is super oily so maybe it couldn’t stick to my face due to that. Definitely not for oily faces.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great toner!
customer_reviews.text: Reduced breakouts in the past week. Love the refreshing feeling after using it. My oil production is balancing out. In combo with cleanser and cream, my dark spots are going away and skin is smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Away Makeup and Leaves You Fresh
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product that has taken 100% of my makeup off without using a wipe first. I love that! It has a nice scent and it leaves a menthol tingle (think Noxzema). My skin is flawless after using this. Very good value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my zits away!
customer_reviews.text: Based on how much dirt/oil is on my cotton pad after using this, I can see that it works. It has a pleasant smell and I haven't had my usual 1 or 2 zits show up on my chin each month since using this - probably that salicylic acid working!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Archenberry

customer_reviews.title: 🚫❌HORRIBLE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This product is ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE, gave me and both my daughter’s HORRIBLE ACNE. And I bought two. TRASH TRASH TRASH!!️!!️!!️ The ONLY plus side is: there is no greasy residue. Other than that I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SkinnTeaHunni

customer_reviews.title: Really Like It!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really loving this cleanser. Going to purchase the toner to go along with it and see how it all works together!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Good for all skin types
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Uses it for deep cleaning my skin. Especially my face. No horrible smell to it. Can use for all body parts. Except some parts. 🙂. Will be ordering it again. Hard to find in stores.
customer_reviews.author: sgt kenny

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Looove this toner I've had wicked oily skin during my pregnancy that's made my pores disgustingly huge and clogged all the time and this is the best toner way better then neutrogena which dries out every bit of my face this keeps is clean and not dried out and my pores are back to normal size thank god
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McClean

customer_reviews.title: Does good for my skin
customer_reviews.text: I researched many different toners and found this one to have the best reviews. I won't say i have sensitive skin but i do suffer from acne,acne scars and things like that. I wash my face and apply the toner right after followed by my moisturizer. It's get's the gunk off my face that my face wash cannot get off. I also see white heads get taken periodically which i like.
customer_reviews.author: Taniya Truss

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Biore products are generally very good for my oily skin. I use this every night and it seems to work as expected. Might be a bit harsh for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K.

customer_reviews.title: These really work for me
customer_reviews.text: These nose strips pull out plenty of gunk for me, especially compared to the cheaper brands. I just wish the price were better!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Witch Hazel toner
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY THIS IF YOU WANT GOOD SKIN. The product appears to make skin better but is actually burning your pores and your skin. Witch Hazel is not good for your skin. Buy products from The Ordinary or CeraVe or Cetaphil. They actually help your skin.
customer_reviews.author: patricia Steinfeldt

customer_reviews.title: Cant stop using it!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product twice a day every day since i bought it and i really like it. Im almost done with the whole bottle. This toner makes my skin feel clean and ready for the next product in my acne skin care routine. On my skin the product does sting a little because its strong but i dont mind that.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Torres

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for my face!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for my face & gets it clean without drying me out. I have an oily face & this works great. The smell is addictingly fresh & I find myself washing my face more often than just in the bath now. No irritation from the witch hazel & I've ordered twice now so I'll probably be doing the recurrent shipment to save some money. Buying this on Amazon is already cheaper than in the store also.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Best ones!
customer_reviews.text: All time favorite Biore strips. Original, charcoal, random limited versions have nothing on witch hazel. I don’t know why these have such great results for me, but they do the best job and I also like the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Katie H

customer_reviews.title: Toner for back
customer_reviews.text: I use this toner on my back after shower since I have some body acne. It’s been a long time (maybe six, seven months) and honestly, I don’t think the old acne is going away. I just keep using it since (1) I don’t seem to get as much new acne as I used to and (2) I like the scent. The toner dries up fast and leaves a somewhat dry feeling (common for anti-acne products) so I won’t call it moisturizing
customer_reviews.author: TIHulk

customer_reviews.title: It Feels Great on my skin & smells nice also!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's worth the purchase. My skin felt great after just the 1st use ( 9.13.2020 )... My face wasn't dried out at all & felt very smooth... Breathable :-) I WILL DEFINITELY PURCHASE MORE!
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix Soul

customer_reviews.title: Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I am hoping this will help clear up the acne my children have. Right now seems to be good, will review again in a few weeks. Price-wise I can't complain and the scent is pleasant which surprised me.
customer_reviews.author: N.

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: It really does cool, and the scent is amazing. Doesnt dry my skin either.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Originals are better
customer_reviews.text: They are alright, for some reason they don’t stick as well as the originals. Also it doesn’t deep clean any more than the originals do, it’s just marketing.
customer_reviews.author: Green Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This has really helped clear up my acne! I use it after washing my face in the shower. It’s worked wonders.
customer_reviews.author: cfull13

customer_reviews.title: Cystic Acne Under Control
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product for my oily, acne prone skin. I tried the Murad toner initially, which helped my cystic chin acne, but later proved to be too harsh w/ more breakouts. This product has a cooling effect on the skin and has kept my acne at bay. I use it once daily after my mixed combo of biore charcoal and wow apple cider vinegar face wash. I also use a vitamin c serum afterwards. I wish this product didn’t have alcohol but using my neutrogena hydro boost gel seems to counter and drying effect.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Harris

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the menthol!
customer_reviews.text: I saw that this product had pretty great reviews and was very excited to add it to my routine to help with my acne prone skin. The second I put it on it burned so badly! I recognized that sensation so I checked the ingredient label and there it was—menthol. I can’t stand the feeling of menthol and it’s a very strong mentholy burn. The scent is also quite strong. If you don’t like menthol, you will HATE this!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlynn Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to be most effective after a hot shower. Since pores open up because of the heat it allowed for the strip to pull more things out. It did pull out alot but some blackheads were still left behind. For the price i do still believe it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Crisy

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: I have tried different biore nose strips and they do nothing for me. It’s a hit or miss if you buy them. They seem to work for some people. I followed the directions carefully and even steamed my face beforehand to open up my pores but this barely pulled anything out. My nose area, the creases and inner cheek area have clogged pores.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for decades. They do the job, don't damage my skin and pull out quite a bit of gunk. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: JCTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cool Breezy Feel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this but didn't realize it's for acne which I do not have. But I think it was nice that they allowed me keep it anyway and still returned my money. What I love about it is that after application it has that very cool and minty breezy feel that awakens your face. I've been using it for 2 days now even tho I do not have acne.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom Lathrobe

customer_reviews.title: Great brand and product, serves purpose
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to reduce pore size on legs prior to self tanning and it makes all the difference in the world when getting the perfect tan on your legs. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. Bolt

customer_reviews.title: Works great for blackheads
customer_reviews.text: I got these in my Walmart beauty box and the first night i tried them & jumped in Amazon to order. 1. Easy to apply 2. Non-irritating 3. Pulled so many blackheads out, I could not believe it was real! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Marie

customer_reviews.title: Well, it was pretty good:)
customer_reviews.text: When I put it on and removed it, my face felt fresh and icy, but the strips only allowed more dirt to enter into my pots after it was cleaned. I think you should find a great skincare routine first to keep your skin clean, and use these on occasion. Still a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Madison M

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been doing pretty well for me! It leaves my skin squeaky clean but doesn’t dry it out. I like the smell and I usually use it before bed to remove any leftover makeup or dirt that my cleanser left behind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much! My skin is sensitive and these are perfect for it. It leaves my skin feeling so soft and I’ve only used it 3 times and I’ve noticed my pores got super small and nose looks so smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not effective, drying, and burns.
customer_reviews.text: It smells nice, but that's about it for positive remarks. I've seen no changes in my acne. It dries out my skin, making it feel tight, and my skin also feels sticky after I use it. It burns, yet it also has this cooling effect at the same time. It literately feels like putting icy hot on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond 💎💕

customer_reviews.title: Good for if you are in a hurry.
customer_reviews.text: The product is good if you are in a hurry and want to wipe your face. The issue I have is it didn’t seem to get my skin as clean as just washing it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Sparkman

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t do much for my skin. In fact, I think it made me break out more. I tried if for about three weeks and gave up on it. It wasn’t too harsh on my skin, it just didn’t give the results I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Arrived opened and not sealed
customer_reviews.text: my package arrived open and not sealed. Luckily not much spilled out but I feel like these things come with a seal that you peel off for safety. I didn't bother to return it, not worth the work :-/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT !!️
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing I don’t have an issue with acne I get some breakouts but not often I just like to find things that help maintain my skin and hopefully keep me from tanning this summer and this products definitely does that i use a cotton pad and I can see the tan wiping off every time, I use this product atleast 3 times a day well Really when ever I use the bathroom 😂
customer_reviews.author: Kejonna

product_meta.title: Bioré Witch Hazel Ultra Cleansing Pore Strips, 6 Nose Strips, Clears Pores up to 2x More than Original Pore Strips, features C-Bond Technology, Oil-Free, Non-Comedogenic Use (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Style:WITCH HAZEL PORE STRIPS| Size:6 CountRemove blackheads and shrink the size of pores with Bioré Blackhead Reducing Deep Cleansing Pore Strip. These deep cleansing nose strips target blackheads and unclog pores for healthy looking skin. Convenient and easy to use, these Pore Strips can be used 1x per week for the deepest clean. Unlike other wannabe ‘pore strips’, ONLY Bioré Deep Cleansing Pore Strips use patented C-bond technology to bind to blackheads and impurities, NOT to skin. These strips are super magnetic to safely and effectively remove dirt, oil, and even stubborn blackheads. Bioré Deep Cleansing Pore Strips leave skin feeling cleaner with visibly smaller pores after continuous use. A dermatologist-tested way to remove blackheads and purify pores.
feature_bullets: Instantly unclog your pores – Bioré Pore Strips, with natural witch hazel, instantly clean or unclog pores and purify your skin for the deepest clean in just 10 Minutes.
Reduce blackheads – See instant results when you use Bioré Pore strips. With continual use, you can help reduce the appearance of blackheads and see a visible reduction in the size of your pores.
Defy Blackheads – Bioré Pore strips unclog pores and remove blackheads, for clean, fresh skin care.
Binds to blackheads, not skin - Using our patented c-bond technology, Bioré Pore Strips are designed to be used once a week to bind to and remove blackheads not skin.
Like a blackhead magnet – Our uniquely developed pore strips act like a magnet to safely and effectively remove dirt, reduce oily skin, and help eliminate blackheads.
Unclogs pores & achieves the deepest clean
Clean and invigorate your pores with these deep cleansing pore strips from BIORÉ
These easy-to-use strips will help extract built-up dirt and oil from your pores that can cause blackheads, leaving your skin feeling fresh and clean
These unscented strips are hypoallergenic and dermatologist tested, so they can be used even by those with sensitive skin

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
